text: John Thomas Myers (February 8, 1927 â€“ January 27, 2015) was an American politician. He was a Republican congressman from Indiana's 7th congressional district in the United States House of Representatives from 1967 to 1997. Myers died at the age of 87 in his birthplace of Covington, Indiana.
